title: Client layout and in game clarity (RUNES,CHAMPION SELECT, WARDS).
body:
There are two sections I hope this thread will be able to improve on. Firstly and mainly is the client. Secondly in game ward clarity.

**Client practicality & clarity:**
-**MOVABLE RUNE PAGES**: There is a feature I have always wanted when I am on my profile, to be able to able to organise my rune pages without having to clear them. Like when you are on a web browser and you can move tabs around. 

-**SUMMONER SPELL WINDOW**: When in champion select and I need to change two {{summoner:7}} summoner spell{{summoner:4}}  but cant do it in one go? I want that back. It used to be just fine. New isn't always better  (personally i always click on a champ in the backgrond cause if forget that the SS window closes and pick a different champion, and then get ****ed cause the timer ended{{champion:17}} ).

 -**CHAMPION CATEGORIES**: Another feature for Champ Select. It would look like the "Item Sets" feature in the profile section but for champions. That way when you are in champ select you can have different categories. For example, all ADCs under the ADC category{{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}} , etc. These categories would be expanded or not (just having categroy title, so that there is no need to scroll down. Additional a "General" category should be at the bottom.

There could also be a "Recommended Bans" category when you are Team Captain. Which would appear above the general pool of champions. It would  just be a feedback from other games played at your current elo. Say for example that at 1700 elo people keep banning {{champion:112}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:17}}  . These could then appear in the Recommended Bans. If the popularity in a certain ban would change, so would the Recommended Bans.

{{item:2043}} **IN GAME CARITY (WARDS) :**{{item:2044}} 
-When placing a ward, having the max range circle of vision it will provide if placed "there". I dont know if calculating terrain would be possible without having a visual overload, but have atleast the optimal circle had the terrain unobstructed to help with better ward placement.

Thanks for reading and please post your opinion bellow!

Cheers, G{{champion:245}} When do I start work Rito? xD

replies.body:
Reasonable suggestions

Movable rune pages - Riot's client is coded with spaghetti code so this is unlikely to ever happen until they release a new client.

Champion categories - Already a thing. Typing in "marksman" will bring up all the currently player classified attack damage carries.

Recommended Bans - An unneeded feature that discourages actual team interaction and creates a hivemind banset.

Ward vision indicators - Interesting idea, find it kind of redundant though because I've placed enough wards to know the limits.
Yeah but you have to type in "marksman". In that case just type in the champions name and get it over with.
